channel.title: Dds-Specs | Spawn | PvM+PvP | Widerness Map Only!
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][img]http://i.imgur.com/OaEKb9D.png[/img]
[CENTER][COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Click [url=http://dds-specs.com]vBulletin - Dds Specs Forums[/url] to play [/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Starting Gear and ::max command, so you can start pking or pvming right away![/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EO1urbc.png[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Get Kills Streaks! Get Great Rewards from killing targets while you PvM![/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/35bsd8k.png[/img]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Show off your global Pking Rank while you chat in ::yell![/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lhDEgyB.png[/img]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Your Votes are appreciated, so you are rewarded [/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8kHxVoV.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rOhO4aW.png[/img]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Pk titles are acquired by killing players! The more kills you have the more loyal the title [/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/BP9nGQh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/20fckjt.png[/img]
[COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Some of our Features are: - Killstreaks with rewards - Bosses that drop 5 loots for top 5 players who did most damage - Perfect PvP and PvM - Ep - Random Drops - Target System with rewards - All special items work - Lots of items buffed (Nex, Dung Armour, etc) [/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFA500"][B][COLOR="#FFA500"][SIZE=4]Click [url=http://dds-specs.com]vBulletin - Dds Specs Forums[/url] to play [/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/COLOR][/CENTER]
